description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

话题：

1. Do you like winter or not? Why?
2. How is the winter in your mind?
3. DIY one topic.
 

范例：

Speaking of winter, I am impressed by its coldness. As the winter is approaching, depression is also getting close to me. Sometimes, I concede that I 'm seasonal blue. However, I never give up finding the method to solve it. In another word, the winter is a good season that teaches you to be a braver person. Challenges are uncertain, while good luck is also unstable. To a degree, it is in the most severe condition that you gain the most happiness. As a result, I consistently inspire myself that everything will be all right with a positive mood.

想要得到专业主持人的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>

title: 英文天天写：过冬

description:
All that and more to come, but we start with the Champions League. And injuries to Petr Čech and John Terry took the shine off a dogged defensive display by Chelsea which earned them a 0-0 draw in the first leg of their European Champions League semi-final against Atlético Madrid in the Spanish Capital. After the game, Chelsea boss José Mourinho confirmed that keeper Čech would miss the rest of the season while bookings of Frank Lampard and John Obi Mikel will rule them out of the second leg next Wednesday. Here's our correspondent John Murray.

José Mourinho picked a team to keep this first leg as tight as possible and keep it tight they did, but it's come at quite a price. Goalkeeper Petr Čech dislocated a shoulder in a nasty fall after only quarter of an hour. Mourinho says Čech will not play again this season, and a twisted ankle means Captain John Terry will only take the field again if they make it through to next month's final. Frank Lampard and Mikel will also miss the second leg of the semi through suspension. However, everything points towards it being similarly tight at Stamford Bridge next week.

title: 切尔西欧冠决赛之路举步维艰（有声）

description:
This programme is a snapshot of what many believe to be the most creative period in our brewing history. It's a big subject but one that can be captured in a small barrel lying on the floor of a warehouse on the outskirts of Aberdeen. Surrounded by pallets and boxes, it still draws the attention of visiting beer writer Pete Brown.

You can really smell that really rich, sort of liquor.

Pete Brown has travelled to Aberdeen to try the latest beers of Scotland's BrewDog brewery, co-founded by a former home-brewer James Watt. And please don't be put off by the terms he's about to use.

This is an American oak barrel that then hosts some Spanish wine. We got it within two weeks of it being emptied. We shipped it over directly from Spain and we've now got a 10% black Imperial Saison in that barrel.

Roughly translated that means a beer being brewed in Scotland is drawing on a tradition found in a French-speaking region of Belgium that, in strength, is linked to the tastes of 18th century Russian czars and, in style, takes inspiration from modern American craft brewing with a detour to Spanish wine country thrown in. It sounds like the most esoteric form of brewing but the flavours inside that barrel reflect an important shift taking place in a drink that's been part of our culture for nearly 2,000 years.

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦

歌手简介：

“怪人奥尔”扬科维奇（"Weird Al" Yankovic，1959年10月23日－），原名阿尔弗雷德·马修·扬科维奇（Alfred Matthew Yankovic），美国创作型恶搞歌手、音乐制作人、演员，曾三次获格莱美奖。著名歌曲有"Eat it"(恶搞Michael Jackson"Beat it")、"Like a Surgeon"(恶搞Madonna"Like a Virgin")、"Fat"(恶搞Michael Jackson"Bad")、"White & Nerdy" (2006)等。

全曲欣赏：

模唱歌词：

I never seem to finish all my food
I always get a doggie bag from the waiter
So I just keep what's still unchewed
And I take it home, save it for later

But then I deal with fungal rot, bacterial formation
Microbes, enzymes, mold and oxidation
I don't care, I've got a secret trick up my sleeve
I never bother with baggies, glass jars, tupperware containers
Plastic cling wrap, really a no-brainer
I just like to keep all my flavours sealed in tight

description:
还在羡慕BBC播音员员一口地道标准的英式发音吗？想要练就纯正英音，《BBC英音模仿秀》帮你忙！《BBC英音模仿秀》是一档沪江部落的原创口语互动节目，主持人对音频进行重点讲解和示范模仿，并对大家递交的口语模仿作品进行一对一的点评！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：cily12

20秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：

Artist Alison Lapper must have one of the most famous bodies in the UK. A statue of her naked and heavily pregnant was displayed in London's Trafalgar Square for two years and a huge inflatable version was a highlight of London's 2012 Paralympic Games' opening ceremony. Alison has a rare congenital condition called phocomelia. She was born with no arms and very short legs.艺术家艾尔森·拉普的身体在英国拥有相当高的知名度。塑有她全裸孕姿的雕像坐落在伦敦特拉法尔加广场已经两年了，而其充气复制品则成为伦敦残奥会开幕式上的亮点。艾尔森患有罕见的先天性短肢畸形病，生来没有双臂，腿脚短小。

语调示意图：

重点单词发音讲解： 
Trafalgar [trə'fælgə]
Paralympics [ˌpærəˈlɪmpɪks]
congenital [kənˈdʒenɪtl]
phocomelia [fəʊkə'mi:lɪə]

title: BBC模仿秀: 残缺之美

description:
《英闻天天译》是一档沪江部落的原创翻译互动节目（戳去参与节目>>>），主持人提供翻译参考文本，对大家递交的翻译作品进行点评，和大家共同进步！本期节目选取的是关于美国吭声了，ISIS准备接招吧的一则英文报道，让我们一起在翻译中关注。

SUMMARY：
继ISIS武装分子发布美国记者斩首视频之后，美方面一直未做出积极回应。此次参与救援，立刻便登上了头条。
 
CONTENT：
The United States says it has carried out airstrikes and dropped humanitarian aid in the Iraqi town of Amerli to protect an ethnic minority that one official says faces the threat of an "imminent massacre."
The town of Amerli, which has been besieged by ISIS fighters, is home to many of Iraq's Shiite Turkmen.
To help the trapped people, the United States has carried out humanitarian airdrops, Pentagon press secretary Rear Adm. John Kirby said late Saturday.
Australia, France and the UK also participated in the aiddrop.
The U.S. military conducted "coordinated airstrikes" against ISIS targets as part of an effort to support the humanitarian operation, Kirby said.
 
KEYWORDS:  
Airstrikes 空袭
humanitarian aid 人道主义援助
Amerli 伊拉克镇名，此处经查询无确切译法，不译即可
ethnic minority 少数民族
imminent 即将到来的，迫近的
besiege 包围
ISIS伊拉克和大叙利亚伊斯兰国 （Islamic State of Iraq and al Shams ，缩写ISIS)是一个基地组织下属的极端恐怖组织，其前身是2006年在伊拉克成立的“伊拉克伊斯兰国”。“al Shams”的意思是“大叙利亚”，即叙利亚、黎巴嫩、约旦、以色列和巴勒斯坦。ISIS组织的目标消除在二战结束后，由温斯顿·丘吉尔所创建的现代中东的国家边界，并在这一地区创立一个由基地组织运作的酋长国。该组织也称“伊拉克和黎凡特伊斯兰国”（ISIL），2014年6月29日，该组织的领袖阿布·贝克尔·巴格达迪自称为哈里发，将政权更名为“伊斯兰国”。）
Shiite Turkmen 什叶派土库曼人
Pentagon press secretary 五角大楼新闻秘书
Rear Adm. John Kirby 海军少将 约翰.科比
coordinated airstrikes 协同空袭
 
Key sentence
1, The United States says it has carried outairstrikes and dropped humanitarian aid in the Iraqi town of Amerli to protectan ethnic minority that one official says faces the threat of an "imminentmassacre."
此句中，主语是US，谓语动词是Say,其后紧跟一个宾语从句说明讲话的内容。Airstrike 和 humanitarian aid 这两个动作用and连接表示并列。说明动作相继发生 先···，并···。
在it 引导的这个从句中，it 形式主义也就是此句的主语US，动作是空袭和空投，in 表示地点状语，即动作发生的地方，to 引导的是目的状语，表示此举的目的。That引导的定语从句修饰an ethnic minority 
 
REFERENCE：
http://edition.cnn.com/2014/08/30/world/meast/isis-iraq-syria/index.html?hpt=hp_t1
 
【沪江英语小编】大家在查看主持人提供的翻译版本前，可以先自己进行尝试翻译练习，只有在不断的翻译中翻译能力才能有所提升哦！

轻松注册沪江，马上参与【英闻天天译】节目练翻译→

本期节目参考译文：（参考译文由该节目主持人提供，仅供参考，欢迎大家讨论）

参考译文1：

据美方报道，该国业已发动空袭，并向伊拉克小镇Amerli空投人道救援物资，以期保护该镇内部少数民族。有官员称，此少数民族随时都面临着惨遭屠戮的威胁。
伊拉克小镇乃是众多什叶派土库曼人的栖身之所，现如今却被ISIS（伊拉克和大叙利亚伊斯兰国）武装分子团团围住。
周六，五角大楼新闻秘书兼海军少将的约翰.科比声称，为救助深陷困境的人民，美国已经向其处所空投救援物资。
澳大利亚，法国，以及英国方面均参与了此次空投。
科比还指出，在美军带领之下，以打击ISIS为目标的“协同空袭”是支持人道主义操作所付出的部分努力。

title: 舞蹈拯救孩子(2/2)

description:
《美剧天天秀》节目是沪江部落一档模仿类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语水平，在轻松看美剧的同时锻炼大家的口语能力。积极参与的童鞋还会得到主持的专业点评哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

原录音：

原文：

【B】 I told Chuck I loved him, again. and he didn't say it back, again.
【J】 Blair, I'm not gonna tell people that.
【B】Why not? I'm giving you what you need to be queen.
【J】 I don't wanna be queen. I just wanted a chance to have a life in school,Look what it almost made me do.
【B】 That's the thing. You need to be cool to be queen.
Anne Boleyn thought only with her heart.And she got her head chopped off.
So her daughter Elizabeth made a vow never to marry a man.She married her country.
Forget boys. Keep your eye on the prize, Jenny Humphrey.
You can't make people love you, but you can make them fear you.
For what it's worth, You're my queen.I choose you.
【J】 Thank you.
